results.title: Bad day
results.brief_description:
Prue’s home and she’s not happy. But she knows what to do and if she could do it again, she’d do it all over you.
Features Susan Wallace as Prue.

results.title: Love at first sight
results.brief_description: An unhappy couple plan a special anniversary dinner but neither realises just how “special” the other has made it. A new husband discovers that he is just the latest in a long line of young men that his powerful older wife has seduced. A gigolo versus black widow battle of the sexes from the director of ‘Babe’ (1995). Cast features June Salter and Richard Moir. Original format 16mm/black and white.

results.title: AFTRS 1994 graduate showreel. Tapes 1 and 2
results.brief_description: Tape 1: Universal Appliance Co (dir. Andrew Lancaster, 9 min.)—Roses are red (dir. Marcella Hayward, 12 min.)—Pandora’s box (dir. Annie Beauchamp, 6 min.)—A Bit of a tiff with the Lord (dir. Peter Duncan, 24 min.)—Bullet proof and blind (dir. Paul Healy, 8 min.)—Fuckwit (dir. Daniel Krige, 18 min.)—Falung (dir. Nina Veretennikova, 20 min.)—Tran the man (dir. Rowan Woods, 17 min.) Tape 2: Unacceptable behaviour (dir. Susan Wallace, 27 min.)—Concrete flesh (dir. Andrew G. Taylor, 9 min.)—Nightwork (dir. Jane Schneider, 13 min.)—The Rockhopper (dir. Wenona Byrne, 13 min.)—It’s time (dir. Liz Doran, 12 min.)—Run beside me (dir. Peta Allen Shera, 5 min.)—El Angelito (dir. Guillermo Martin Sepulveda, 20 min.)—Simple (dir. Polly Seddon, 14 min.)

results.title: Universal Appliance Co.
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Michaeley O'Brien, Ruth Kleinhenz and Andrew Lancaster
results.brief_description: 1. An inventor finally gets a chance to mass produce his latest creation at the Universal Appliance Company factory. The production line runs smoothly until advertising and romance become distractions. Another multi-award winning production for director and sound designer Andrew Lancaster.
results.creator_credit_for_label: AFTRS, Michaeley O’Brien, Ruth Kleinhenz and Andrew Lancaster

results.title: To Florinda
results.brief_description: Nurse Ross works in an inner city hospital. She is afraid of death and has to nurse a woman dying of lung cancer. Starring Noni Hazlehurst and Anne Haddy.

results.title: Roses are red
results.creator_credit: AFTRS, Robert Connolly and Marcella Hayward
results.brief_description: Joy and Di are two women on a mission, but Di wonders whether Joy has got what it takes. Joy wonders if she has got what it takes. After all, it’s not easy being a parking cop. Brian thinks it’s even tougher being a flower seller - and the last thing he needs is a parking ticket. Starring David Wenham (‘Lord of the Rings’), Kris McQuade and Jacqueline McKenzie. Original format 35mm.

results.title: Nightride
results.creator_credit: Della Churchill, Martin Murphy and AFTRS
results.brief_description: A masked killer, a series of brutal murders, a confined space, a resourceful young hero and a terrifying confrontation. Nightride cleverly condenses the conventions of the horror film established in Halloween and Friday the 13th into a suspenseful 11 minute film.
results.description: A masked killer, a series of brutal murders, a confined space, a resourceful young hero and a terrifying confrontation. Nightride cleverly condenses the conventions of the horror film established in Halloween and Friday the 13th into a suspenseful 11 minute film.
